preferences.titledesc: Various settings only useful for debugging Proof General (developers only)

pref.name: DEBUG
pref.tooltip: Sets verbose debugging output for assorted methods

pref.name: Use marker annotations for scripting state regions (BUGGY)
pref.tooltip: Markers are used instead of coloured tokens for scripting states; this is much simpler and should solve problems with 'dummy' parse events; however, it may have its own efficiency problems and difficulties because markers seem not well designed for changing positions

pref.name: Outline shows command positions
pref.tooltip: Sets outline view to display positions of commands in document instead of types

pref.name: Log Prover I/O
pref.tooltip: Shows prover input and output (raw PGML) on the console
